title: Review findings for wzcc (423ea62d): roborev show 3 / one-shot fix with roborev fix 3
Add conversation history browsing to details panel (Epic)
description: Enable browsing past conversation turns (user prompt + assistant response pairs) in the TUI details panel. Currently only the last prompt/output is shown. This epic covers parsing transcript history, adding scroll navigation, and optimizing for large files.

title: Phase 1: MVP conversation history browsing
description:
Minimal viable implementation of conversation history browsing in the details panel.

Scope:
- Add ConversationTurn struct (user_prompt + assistant_response pair)
- Extend transcript parser to extract last N turn pairs from tail of JSONL
- Add history: Vec<ConversationTurn> field to ClaudeSession
- Add scroll state (selected turn index) to App struct
- Update render_details to display the selected conversation turn
- Bind Ctrl+J / Ctrl+K for history navigation (avoids j/k conflict with session list)
- Update footer to show history navigation keybindings when applicable

Out of scope: tool_use display, timestamps, lazy loading, focus mode

title: Phase 2: Improve history display quality
description:
Enhance conversation history display with richer information.

Scope:
- Show timestamp per conversation turn (relative time like '5m ago')
- Decide tool_use/tool_result display policy: start with hidden (userâ†’assistant pairs only), add summary or fold later if needed
- Consider introducing focus mode (list vs details) to allow j/k for history browsing in details panel
- Better text wrapping (word-aware instead of character-level)

Depends on: Phase 1 completion

title: Phase 3: Large file optimization and live update handling
description:
Optimize for large transcript files and handle real-time updates gracefully.

Scope:
- Lazy loading: parse history on-demand from tail, load more as user scrolls up
- Scroll position preservation when transcript file is updated by file watcher
- Performance profiling and tuning for transcripts > 1MB
- Cache parsed conversation turns, invalidate on file change

Depends on: Phase 1 and Phase 2 completion

title: Review findings for wzcc (4712a6f5): roborev show 4 / one-shot fix with roborev fix 4
Review findings for wzcc (5dc82809): roborev show 5 / one-shot fix with roborev fix 5
description:
Review #5 findings for commit 5dc8280. Addressing:
1. (medium) Ctrl+D overscroll: history_scroll_offset grows unbounded internally, causing Ctrl+U to appear unresponsive. Fix by passing scroll_offset as &mut to render and writing back clamped value.
2. (low) G handler missing pending_g clear: g->G->g triggers gg. Add self.pending_g = false to G handler.
3. (low) Add truncation test for 5000-char limit in extract_conversation_turns.
close_reason: All 3 findings from Review #5 addressed in commit 4b64655
